title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Peak Performance: IoT Innovation in Professional Sports (SPF301)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 巅峰表现：职业体育中的物联网创新 (SPF301)
abstract: Discover how Catapult revolutionizes elite sports performance using AWS IoT technology. From the English Premier League to the NFL and NBA, learn how the world's leading teams leverage Catapult's cutting-edge wearable technology to capture millions of data points per athlete. This session reveals how Catapult architected their next-generation tracking system on AWS IoT, transforming raw biometric data into predictive insights that prevent injuries, optimize training loads, and maximize athlete performance. See how the combination of IoT, analytics, and AI/ML is reshaping the future of professional sports science.
abstract_cn: 了解Catapult如何利用AWS IoT技术彻底改变精英体育表现。从英超联赛到NFL和NBA，了解世界领先的球队如何利用Catapult的尖端可穿戴技术捕获每位运动员数百万个数据点。本次会议揭示了Catapult如何在AWS IoT上构建其下一代跟踪系统，将原始生物识别数据转化为预测性洞察，从而预防伤病、优化训练负荷并最大化运动员表现。了解物联网、分析和人工智能/机器学习的结合如何重塑专业运动科学的未来。
